scripts.qianjia_dev: cd build & set NODE_ENV=dev         & set APP_ENV=qianjia & webpack-dev-server  --progress --hot --port 8388 --historyApiFallback
scripts.qianjia_dev_notHot: cd build & set NODE_ENV=dev         & set APP_ENV=qianjia & webpack-dev-server  --progress --hot false --port 8388 --historyApiFallback
scripts.qianjia_online: cd build & set NODE_ENV=production  & set APP_ENV=qianjia &node build.js & node buildStatic.js --watch
scripts.qianjia_online_reactAuto: cd build & set NODE_ENV=production  & set APP_ENV=qianjia &webpack --display-error-details --watch
scripts.qianjia_mock: cd build & set NODE_ENV=            & set APP_ENV=qianjia &node json-server
scripts.piaojia_dev: cd build & set NODE_ENV=dev         & set APP_ENV=piaojia & webpack-dev-server  --progress --hot --port 8488 --historyApiFallback
scripts.piaojia_online: cd build & set NODE_ENV=production  & set APP_ENV=piaojia &webpack --display-error-details
scripts.piaojia_mock: cd build & set NODE_ENV=            & set APP_ENV=piaojia &node json-server
